p: Essential oil samples S1 and S2 displayed close chemical compositions, dominated by germacrene D (23.6 and 20.5%, respectively), followed by germacrene d-8-one (8.9 and 8.7%), (10βH)-1β,8β-oxido-cadin-4-ene ( 38) (7.3 and 8.7%), (7αH)-germacrene d-8β-ol ( 52) (7.8 and 7.4%) and cadina-1(10),4-dien-8β-ol ( 56) (7.6 and 7.2%). Other compounds were also present in both samples at appreciable contents: ( E)-β-caryophyllene (5.3 and 5.7%), ( E)-β-ocimene (4.5 and 4.2%) and ( Z)-β-ocimene (3.4 and 4.5%).
